subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Larry Hughes scored 22 points and LeBron James had 18 to lead Cleveland to a 98-92 victory over the host Philadelphia 76ers last night, keeping the Cavaliers alive for the second seed in the Eastern Conference playoffs.
snippet: Larry Hughes scored 22 points and LeBron James had 18 to lead Cleveland to a 98-92 victory over the host Philadelphia 76ers last night, keeping the Cavaliers alive for the second seed in the Eastern Conference playoffs.
